name: shouldKeepFieldsStateAfterUnsuccessfulLogin()
description: Validates that the user is unable to log in with incorrect password, they are being shown an error with the expected description, and both the username and password field retain the same data entered by user before they clicked login button.
descriptionHtml: Validates that the user is unable to log in with incorrect password, they are being shown an error with the expected description, and both the username and password field retain the same data entered by user before they clicked login button.

labels.name: story
labels.value: User tries to log in using incorrect password, and the login form retains information entered by the user.
